titles.title: Federal Anti-Stalker Act of 1996
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide Federal penalties for stalking.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 2/1/1996--Introduced. Federal Anti-Stalker Act of 1996 - Amends the Federal criminal code to set penalties for stalking (i.e., willfully, maliciously, and repeatedly following or harassing another person and making credible threats with the intent to place that person in reasonable fear of death or serious bodily injury of that person or a member of that person's immediate family).
